formattedAddress: 247 W 87th St, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 247 W 87th St, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text:
Since I started my own private personal training business I was looking for an online platform to market myself. After much research I stumbled upon Neighborhood Trainers (NT). Compared to other personal training websites NT is much more user friendly and makes it easy to filter & compare trainers to get exactly what you need. NT also lists private training studios around NYC which is very convenient.

One thing that was pleasantly surprising upon signing up was I received a phone call from the owner Glenn. He made sure I was satisfied with the website, offered solutions for training facilities and is very personable. Whenever I received a notice of a potential new client he would follow up to make sure I received it.

I'm happy to say I have closed my first client and can't wait for more! I am proud to be part of NT and love the support from Glenn.

originalText.text: Neighborhood Trainers has been one of the biggest resources for my private training business. Over the years I have received dozens of quality leads, some clients I am still training today. This platform provides the support that an independent trainer needs to grow their business and learn about gym openings or opportunities that they wouldn’t know otherwise. Glenn is attentive and looks out for the trainers best interest at all times.

originalText.text: As a fitness professional, neighborhood trainers was a game changer. It transformed my business and set me up with the perfect type of clients for my personality and style. It’s been a great tool for me to attract three of my best clients and I think the clients are very happy too. It’s hard to find a trainer randomly so I recommend neighborhood trainers for all those seeking trainers and also obviously any professionals looking to get more clients in an almost effortless way

originalText.text: I have been using Neighborhood Trainer for a number of years to promote my personal training services. This platform has been the best for me in generating quality leads in clientele. I have Glenn to thank at large for helping me grow my business into the success it is today! Glenn has been super helpful and is always quick to respond when I ever have any questions. I've also found quite a few of the independent gyms I use for training clients from this site. If you are a personal trainer this is the site to promote yourself on!

originalText.text: Neighborhood Trainers has been a huge help over the years with helping me build my clientele. I started using these services when I first became a trainer in 2015 and continue to use the services to help with lead generation. Glenn has always provided the best service and is attentive and quick to respond to any questions or concerns that come up. I highly recommend using this service to build clientele and gain extra exposure.
